title: LOW PRIORITY QUEUE timer resetting

replies.body: Most of the time when those timers reset, it's caused by some kind of blip or hiccup in your connection so you might have actually been kicked out of the queue before a match was found, causing the timer to keep going. Check for anything in your network settings that might be off with the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but do make sure you check the steps on port forwarding and DNS settings specifically.
